original_title: CSE’s ASPI records new all-time high
original_body_lines: The All Share Price Index (ASPI) of the Colombo Stock Exchange gained 169.53 points (1.21%) to close at 14,205.34 points today, marking a new all-time high.
Meanwhile, the S&P SL20 has increased by 57.99 points (1.39%) to close at 4,244.45 points.
Today’s total turnover was recorded as over Rs. 6.1 billion.
